column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Bou - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad we satisfied your quest for ramen. In the past year
column2: several more ramen shops have sprouted up in Houston
column3: and it is our firm belief that the ones that do ramen well
column4: will continue to do well. Those that do not -- or cannot -- will fall away. Thank you again for your business
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
